summary: This is a partial conversion of Adonnays Elven Weaponry mod from Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img=800x315]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Banner_V7.png[/img]



[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Announcements_V2.png[/img]
[b][u][color=red]Elven Weaponry version .05 has been released!!![/color][/u][/b]

Here's version 0.05 of Elven Weaponry!
This release adds all the missing tempering recipes so all weapons can now be upgraded on the grindstone.
We also added the Skywood and Whitewood bows.

Unfortunately I no longer have the time for gaming and modding that I used to. That being said this willÂ 
likely be the last update to this mod by me. If anyone is interested in picking it up and continuing my work
please let me know.

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Information_V3.png[/img]
Elven Weaponry is a project to convert all of Adonnay's Elven
Weapons to Skyrim. It is a work in progress and I will update
with more weapons as real life and time allow me to.

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Disclaimer_V3.png[/img]
While I don't think there is anything in my mod that could cause
problems with your game please make a backup of your saves. I am
not responsible if this breaks your game.

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Textures_V2.png[/img]
The standard version of this mod uses all of Adonnay's original textures.
As of version .03 I have darkened the original textures to look better and
less "washed out" in-game.

The HD version contains all new high res textures by SithMaster2010.
In several places we still use select high res textures by Adonnay that
have been adjusted to work with HD. Please keep in mind that the HD version
of the mod is standalone and is NOT an upgrade/patch. Please always remove the
standard version first if changing to HD.

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Weapons_V1.png[/img]
These are the weapons included in the latest version of Elven Weaponry.

One Handed Swords:
1. Elmwood Sabre
2. Cloud Sabre
3. Brightwood Sabre
4. Ebony Sabre
5. Ivory Sabre
6. White Leather Sabre
7. Ebony Scimitar
8. Ebony Courtblade
9. Cloud Courtblade

Two Handed Swords:
1. Ebony Courtblade 2H
2. Cloud Courtblade 2H
3. Ebony Longblade
4. Green Longblade
5. Ebony Warblade
6. Cloud Warblade

Knives:
1. Ebony Knife
2. Elmwood Knife

Bows:
1. Elven Bow Ebony
2. Elven Bow Elmwood
3. Elven Bow Redwood
4. Elven Bow Skywood
5. Elven Bow Whitewood
6. Elven Bow Ivory
7. Elven War Bow Elm

Arrows:
1. Elven Arrows Elmwood
2. Elven Arrows Tree
3. Elven Arrows Ebony


[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Howtogetthem_V1.png[/img]
The weapons can all be crafted at the forge, including arrows. They can
be found under Elven Smithing.

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Bugs_V1.png[/img]
There are currently no known bugs affecting game play.
If you encounter any please report them in the comments.

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Installation_V1.png[/img]
Download and install with Nexus Mod Manager.

Or download the files manually and extract to your
Steam\SteamApps\Common\Skyrim\Data folder using 7zip or winrar.

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/ModsCompatible_V1.png[/img]

[b][u][color=red]ACE - Comprehensive Enhancements[/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]Download here![/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15373]Download here![/url]

[b][u][color=red]Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows[/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5711]Download here![/url]

[b][u][color=red]SkyRe Compatibility - Elven Weaponry[/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=21498]Download here![/url]
[b][u][color=red]
Dual Sheath Redux Compatibility[/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647]Download here![/url]

[img=393x96]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj515/cageu/Credits_V1.png[/img]

Adonnay for his original Elven Weaponry mod for Oblivion.

SithMaster2010 for the great new HD textures.

Elandra for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13356]German translation.[/url]

Azarian for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13275]Czech translation[/url]

TeodosisusShine for the[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16278] Italian translation[/url]


[b][size=5][color=green]Other Mods By Me[/color][/size][/b]
[b][u][color=red]Breton Longbow[/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=22316]Download here![/url][/center]
author: cageu

files.name: ElvenWeaponry_v01
files.changelogHtml: Initial Release. Includes Elmwood Sabre, Ebony Sabre, Cloud Courtblade, Ebony Courtblade, Ebony Scimitar, Elmwood quiver and arrows, Tree quiver and arrows, and Ebony quiver and arrows.

files.name: ElvenWeaponry_v02
files.changelogHtml:
Added one handed swords. Brightwood Sabre and Cloud Sabre.
Added bow. Elven Bow Ebony.

files.name: ElvenWeaponry_HD_v02
files.changelogHtml:
Added one handed swords. Brightwood Sabre and Cloud Sabre.
Added bow. Elven Bow Ebony.

files.name: ElvenWeaponry_v03
files.changelogHtml:
Added two handed swords. Cloud Courtblade 2H, Ebony Courtblade 2H, Green Longblade, Ebony Longblade, Cloud Warblade and Ebony Warblade.
Added knives. Elmwood knife and Ebony knife.
Added bows. Elven Bow Elmwood, Elven Bow Redwood, Elven Bow Ivory, and Elven War Bow Elm.
Adjusted damage and speed values of all weapons so they are more balanced and not so overpowered.

files.name: ElvenWeaponry_HD_v03
files.changelogHtml:
Added two handed swords. Cloud Courtblade 2H, Ebony Courtblade 2H, Green Longblade, Ebony Longblade, Cloud Warblade and Ebony Warblade.
Added knives. Elmwood knife and Ebony knife.
Added bows. Elven Bow Elmwood, Elven Bow Redwood, Elven Bow Ivory, and Elven War Bow Elm.
Adjusted damage and speed values of all weapons so they are more balanced and not so overpowered.

files.name: ElvenWeaponry_HD_v04
files.changelogHtml:
Added Ivory and White Leather Sabres
Fixed .nif files to properly support normal maps.
Updated some textures.

files.name: ElvenWeaponry_HD_v05
files.changelogHtml:
Added all missing tempering recipes. All weapons should now be upgradable at the grindstone.
Added the Skywood and Whitewood bows.
